RightAllow.description: Allow full access to the given database.

database.description: a specific database: 'test_db', multiple databases by prefix: 'test_*', all databases: '*'

RightTask.description: RightTask grant database access by a set of task types.

database.description: a specific database: 'test_db', multiple databases by prefix: 'test_*', all databases: '*'

types.description: set fo task types like: create, read, upsert, delete, query, ...

RightSendMessage.description:
RightSendMessage allows sending messages to a database by a set of names.

Note: commands are messages - so permission of sending commands is same as for messages.

database.description: a specific database: 'test_db', multiple databases by prefix: 'test_*', all databases: '*'

names.description: a specific message: 'std.Echo', multiple messages by prefix: 'std.*', all messages: '*'

RightSubscribeMessage.description:
RightSubscribeMessage allows subscribing messages send to a database.

Note: commands are messages - so permission of subscribing commands is same as for messages.

database.description: a specific database: 'test_db', multiple databases by prefix: 'test_*', all databases: '*'

names.description: a specific message: 'std.Echo', multiple messages by prefix: 'std.*', all messages: '*'

RightOperation.description:
RightOperation grant database access for the given containers based on a set of operations.
E.g. create, read, upsert, delete, query or aggregate (count)
It also allows subscribing database changes by subscribeChanges

database.description: a specific database: 'test_db', multiple databases by prefix: 'test_*', all databases: '*'

containers.description: grant execution of operations and subscriptions on listed containers

ContainerAccess.description: Grant execution of specific container operations and subscriptions

descriptions.create: allow to create entities in a container
descriptions.upsert: allow to upsert entities in a container
descriptions.delete: allow to delete entities in a container
descriptions.deleteAll: allow to delete all container entities
descriptions.patch: allow to patch entities in a container
descriptions.read: allow to read entities in a container
descriptions.query: allow to query entities in a container
descriptions.aggregate: allow to aggregate - count - entities in a container
descriptions.mutate: allow to mutate - create, upsert, delete and patch - entities in a container
descriptions.full: allow all operation types in a container

names.description: a specific predicate: 'TestPredicate', multiple predicates by prefix: 'Test*', all predicates: '*'
